name: AuntBertha
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: aunt bertha
des:
Aunt Bertha's mission is to connect all people in need and the programs that serve them (with dignity and ease). 

Aunt Bertha has built the largest network of free & reduced cost programs in every ZIP Code across the United States—this includes federal, state, county, municipal, and local programs in the biggest cities and smallest towns. 

Use the Aunt Bertha skill to search for these kinds of programs in your area. You can search for free or reduced cost services like medical care, food, job training, and more.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
